title: Live Briefing: Gaza strikes leave dozens of people dead as Israeli bombardment continues
description: Israeli strikes in Gaza left 77 people dead over 24 hours, the Gaza civil defense force said early Friday. More strikes followed.
author: Kelsey Ables, Victoria Bisset, Bryan Pietsch, John Hudson, Hazem Balousha
byline: Kelsey Ables, Victoria Bisset, Bryan Pietsch, John Hudson, Hazem Balousha, Ishaan Tharoor, Dan Rosenzweig-Ziff, Mohamad El Chamaa, Karen DeYoung, Claire Parker, Miriam Berger
excerpt: Israeli strikes in Gaza left 77 people dead over 24 hours, the Gaza civil defense force said early Friday. More strikes followed.
text: Israeli strikes in Gaza left 77 people dead over 24 hours, the Gaza Health Ministry said early Friday.Later in the day, more strikes followed. Eight people were killed in a strike on a building in the Nuseirat refugee camp in central Gaza, according to the two hospitals where bodies were brought. A strike on a building in the Jabalya refugee camp in Gaza’s north killed 10 people, including seven children, and left 15 injured, Gaza civil defense force spokesman Mahmoud Bassal said in a statement.
html:
Israeli strikes in Gaza left 77 people dead over 24 hours, the Gaza Health Ministry said early Friday.

Later in the day, more strikes followed. Eight people were killed in a strike on a building in the Nuseirat refugee camp in central Gaza, according to the two hospitals where bodies were brought. A strike on a building in the Jabalya refugee camp in Gaza’s north killed 10 people, including seven children, and left 15 injured, Gaza civil defense force spokesman Mahmoud Bassal said in a statement.
